body_html:
It's not any specific term, I've been mostly thinking about sth like a regular repo that you can install as a package (from your/your company's org). If it's good then we will also be recommending it in the forums and other places if someone will be looking for a tool like it.

I hope you understand the problem I had in mind, so I'll let myself close this issue, as I don't think we will be taking any action on it right now. Feel free to comment if you have any other related questions. Thanks!
